description.lang: Wink is the quick and simple way to connect you and the products you rely on every day in your home.You can manage products from multiple brands in a single intuitive app, allowing you to select the products that are right for your life.Stay connected to your home no matter where you are with the Wink app, available for free on the App Store or Google Play. Connect your Wink Hub in a matter of minutes, then start adding products like lights, blinds, locks, and more.
